title: BRIEF-Acrow Formwork And Construction Services Announces Acquisition Of Uni-Span Australia
text:
BRIEF-Acrow Formwork And Construction Services Announces Acquisition Of Uni-Span Australia

Stock Markets 7 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 19:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Acrow Formwork And Construction Services Announces Acquisition Of Uni-Span Australia Oct 17 (Reuters) - Acrow Formwork and Construction Services Ltd : * ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF UNI-SPAN AUSTRALIA PTY LIMITED * ACROW TO ACQUIRE UNI-SPAN FOR $21.25M * ACQUISITION TO BE 22% EPS ACCRETIVE ON PRO-FORMA FY19 RESULTS * ACQUISITION TO BE FUNDED FROM EXPANDED FINANCE FACILITIES WITH WESTPAC * EARNOUT PAYMENT FOR DEAL CAPPED AT $4.3M (NYSE: ) * JOINT ACROW/UNI-SPAN CONTRACT SECURED WITH WESTERN DOWNS FOR SUN METALS ZINC REFINERY EXPANSION FOR $2.75M

BRIEF-Acrow Formwork And Construction Services Announces Acquisition Of Uni-Span Australia
description: BRIEF-Acrow Formwork And Construction Services Announces Acquisition Of Uni-Span Australia
